kv13.3:6.3: Nanu taṃ kammaṃ payuttaṃ kukkuccaṃ uppāditaṃ vippaṭisāriyaṃ janitanti?
kv13.3:6.5: Hañci taṃ kammaṃ payuttaṃ kukkuccaṃ uppāditaṃ vippaṭisāriyaṃ janitaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv13.3:8.1: Anantarāpayutto puggalo taṃ kammaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā kukkuccaṃ paṭivinodetvā vippaṭisāriyaṃ paṭivinetvā abhabbo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamitunti?
kv13.3:9.1: Anantarāpayutto puggalo taṃ kammaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā kukkuccaṃ paṭivinodetvā vippaṭisāriyaṃ paṭivinetvā abhabbo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamitunti?
kv13.3:9.3: Nanu taṃ kammaṃ paṭisaṃhaṭaṃ kukkuccaṃ paṭivinoditaṃ vippaṭisāriyaṃ paṭivinītanti?
kv13.3:9.5: Hañci taṃ kammaṃ paṭisaṃhaṭaṃ kukkuccaṃ paṭivinoditaṃ vippaṭisāriyaṃ paṭivinītaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv13.3:9.6: “anantarāpayutto puggalo taṃ kammaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā kukkuccaṃ paṭivinodetvā vippaṭisāriyaṃ paṭivinetvā abhabbo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamitun”ti.
kv13.3:10.5: Hañci taṃ kammaṃ payutto āsi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
